decoworld.model.world.dungeon

Class DungeonGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.dungeon.DungeonGenerator

  • public class DungeonGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    An immutable dungeon generator that helps generate a dungeon World with respect to the given constructor arguments.
